projects.name: Research Mentorship Website
projects.description: A collaboration with the Undergraduate Student Government! This full-stack website serves to deliver aspiring mentors and mentees an opportunity to work with fellow students in intensive research. Contributed by Keming He, Trevor Gerald, and Jerry Chang.

projects.name: Event Feed Project
projects.description: A centralized listing of all OSU's events and club postings for all to see. Features RSVP, reminders, and more.
